---
title: "Organize models in the inventory"
---

Customize the model inventory to fit your needs.

## Prerequisites

Any user can complete these steps.

## Steps

1. [Log in to the {{< var vm_platform >}}]({{< var vm_url >}}).

2. Navigate to the **Model Inventory**.

3. Use the top buttons to organize the model inventory to your preference:
   - Search for models using **Search**. 
   - Use **Filter** to filter models by business units, developers, model tiering, model status, owners, use, validators, or vendor model.
   - Click **Manage Columns** to manage column visibility and order. You can toggle visibility for each category and drag the option to change the order.
   - Use **Sort** to sort results by certain criteria.
   - Click **Display table** or **Display cards** to toggle between table and card view.

Changes are automatically saved for your account.
